FAQ / Wave 2 / Characters /
View On FortressMaximus.io

Warpath - Confident Sharpshooter

  1. If my opponent has more than 1 card in their scrap pile with two blue battle icons, can they choose to do 1 damage to each of two of their characters, or is all the damage done to the same character? [Source: WotC]
    They can choose individually for each card.
  2. Does Warpath/Acid Storm prevent the initial two battle flips for defense/attack respectively? In other words, are the initial two battle flips considered bold/tough? [Source: WotC]
    No.
